title: The Art of Political Lying - "Falsehood flies"

content.prompt: What is the primary function of the statement "Falsehood flies, and truth comes limping after it" (Paragraph 2)

choices.label: It personifies falsehood to evoke sympathy for those accused of lying.
It creates a visual contrast to emphasize the power of lies.
It employs alliteration to suggest that truth and falsehood are closely related.
It uses hyperbole to undermine its literal meaning.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
